landing.header: All the paths you didn't go..
landing.headerAction: You can now explore them all!
landing.intro: At LearnGraph, we believe everyone deserves to forge their own unique path. We're building an interactive, dynamic map of knowledge – a sort of Google Maps for learning – designed to empower you to navigate a world of endless opportunities tailored to your passions. Our platform is actively in development and driven by community collaboration. Join our <linktodiscord>Community of Practice</linktodiscord> on Discord and help shape the future of education!
landing.missionStatementText: Co-creating the future of education - free for everyone. We enable people to learn, independent of their situation in life and the resources at their disposal. Read our whitepaper here.
landing.podcastAlternative: Prefer listening? Try our podcast alternative and embark on an audio journey with us!

about.Storyp: After living in a Buddhist temple, Laurin came back with no agenda—just presence. He listened. One day, a friend said, “Wouldn’t it be cool if learning worked like Google Maps?” The idea sat in the space between them, waiting. Laurin picked it up. Soon, others joined. That’s how LearnGraph quietly began.
about.Our-Team-text: We’re not just building a platform—we’re living the practice.
about.team-Efecan: Head of Educational Strategy and Innovation
about.quote-Laurin: The best ideas come from stillness. LearnGraph wasn’t built to disrupt — it was built to listen, to guide, and to grow with those who are ready to listen.
about.quote-Nama: The world is a really big place and there are people that have been privilleged with resources, it's the duty of those people to help the ones without
about.quote-Efecan: Education is not about filling a vessel, but about kindling a flame - and I intend to set the whole system ablaze.
about.quote-Talal: It's scary out there, but we were never meant to be alone. Whats important isn't what I can do for me its what everyone can do for the human race
about.team-placeholder-description: We’re always looking for curious minds to join us. Whether you code, care about learning, or just have a wild idea—come say hi. <discord>Join our Discord</discord>, or send us a message to <email>jobs@learngraph.org</email>!

soon.spreadSupport: Spread the Word & Support the Cause
soon.productSoon: Our product is soon ready for demo and we’re launching a non-profit initiative in Africa with

university.heroText: Transform your educational ecosystem with personalized analytics, hybrid learning solutions, and seamless interoperability.

challenge1.headline: Enhanced Retention
challenge1.text: Support students before subtle disengagement occurs by proactively addressing early warning signs. Optimize support to boost retention without casting blame.

challenge2.headline: Integrated Pathways
challenge2.text: Break down silos in your curriculum to connect interdisciplinary courses. Enable smoother transitions and enhanced academic mobility across departments.

challenge3.headline: Data to Action
challenge3.text: Transform your existing data into actionable strategies. Convert insights into targeted interventions that support student success.

challenge4.headline: Seamless Interoperability
challenge4.text: Align your systems with European standards to create a unified ecosystem that recognizes learning achievements across borders.

insight1.title: 23% Graduation Increase
insight1.description: Georgia State University used predictive analytics to target at-risk students, resulting in a 23% increase in graduation rates and a 5% decrease in the achievement gap.

insight2.title: 5% decreased achievement gap
insight2.description: The University of Arizona's personalized interventions based on predictive analytics led to a 7% increase in retention rates and a 10% boost in graduation rates.

insight3.title: 30% Retention Improvement
insight3.description: Studies suggest that sophisticated learning analytics can improve student retention by up to 30%, demonstrating the power of technology in education.

insight4.title: 11% Reduced failure rates
insight4.description: A meta-analysis shows active learning reduces failure rates from 32% to 21% and improves exam performance significantly, underscoring its benefits in STEM courses.

university.insightsSummary: Data-driven interventions and active learning strategies can significantly enhance student retention, reduce failure rates, and boost graduation outcomes.

solution1.headline: Hybrid Learning Containers
solution1.text: Our platform creates flexible, learner-centered spaces that blend digital and physical experiences. These containers are self-directed incubators for learning & personal growth. With hands-on projects everyone embarks on their personal journey; yet collectively learning & working towards a goal.
keywords: Protecting the flame of the learners

solution2.headline: Peer-Coaching & Mentorship
solution2.text: We foster robust networks of peer coaches and mentors that provide personalized support. This community-based approach builds confidence and enhances academic outcomes. Coaching and beeing coached are both incredible opportunities to learn.

solution3.headline: Interoperability & Open-Source Infrastructure
solution3.text: LearnGraph aligns with the European Learning Model (ELM) and ESCO Skills & Competencies, enabling seamless recognition of academic progress across institutions with a scalable, open-source framework. While continuously evolving our internal dataset to map even to global open standarts like OpenCreds and Durable Skills.

cta.headline: Take the first step into the Future
cta.text: Discover how our innovative, data-driven platform transforms insights into actionable strategies that enhance student success and institutional growth.

uspBlocks.reduceDropoutText: LearnGraph helps your students stay on track with personalized learning paths, peer coaching, and emotional reflection — all built into a platform that works alongside your existing systems.
uspBlocks.yourWayText: Tired of one-size-fits-all learning? LearnGraph shows you exactly where you are, where you want to go, and how to get there — with smart guidance, real resources, and peer support.
uspBlocks.upskillText: Every new skill is a step toward your success. It’s soft skills or digital tools, LearnGraph guides learners step-by-step with peer support and real-world relevance.
uspBlocks.openSourceText: We don’t chase profit. We chase purpose. Your support goes directly into scaling impact across the Global South.
uspBlocks.finalCTAText: Experience how LearnGraph transforms uncertainty into a clear, navigable journey — one decisive step at a time.

infoBlocks.companiesHeadline: Reskill, upskill, or just grow — without losing your mind.
infoBlocks.independentHeadline: No more guessing. You now have a GPS for your learning journey.
infoBlocks.fundersHeadline: Invest in an education system that doesn’t just teach — it transforms.
